comments.body: @HyukjinKwon I may need your input on whether this is the right way to 'replace' use of HiveContext; is this test needed anymore even?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -74,17 +74,14 @@ def setUpClass(cls):
         super(ImageFileFormatOnHiveContextTest, cls).setUpClass()
         cls.hive_available = True
         # Note that here we enable Hive's support.
-        cls.spark = None
         try:
-            cls.sc._jvm.org.apache.hadoop.hive.conf.HiveConf()
+            cls.spark = SparkSession.builder.enableHiveSupport().getOrCreate()

@@ -74,17 +74,14 @@ def setUpClass(cls):
         super(ImageFileFormatOnHiveContextTest, cls).setUpClass()
         cls.hive_available = True
         # Note that here we enable Hive's support.
-        cls.spark = None
         try:
-            cls.sc._jvm.org.apache.hadoop.hive.conf.HiveConf()
+            cls.spark = SparkSession.builder.enableHiveSupport().getOrCreate()
